message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $90?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $80?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $85, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $80 is the sweet spot?
